IndexPage.description: Full-service medical travel organization to the best clinics in South Korea.
IndexPage.title: Treatment in South Korea with comfort.

step1.title: Send a request
step1.desc: Fill out the short form or contact us via messenger.

step2.title: Consultation
step2.desc: We will recommend a hospital and estimate the cost.

step3.title: Trip to Korea
step3.desc: We will help organize your trip and accommodation.

step4.title: Treatment
step4.desc: You will receive treatment at the chosen clinic.

dermatology.title: Dermatology
dermatology.desc: Diagnosis and treatment of skin, hair, and nail diseases.

internal.title: Internal Medicine
internal.desc: Treatment of internal organ diseases, including hypertension and diabetes.

ent.title: Otolaryngology (ENT)
ent.desc: Treatment of ear, nose, and throat conditions.

obgyn.title: Obstetrics & Gynecology
obgyn.desc: Women's health, pregnancy care, and childbirth.

ophthalmology.title: Ophthalmology
ophthalmology.desc: Vision correction, cataract, and eye disease treatment.

oncology.title: Oncology
oncology.desc: Cancer diagnosis and treatment using advanced technologies.

LocaleLayout.title: Medical Tourism in Korea | NS Medical
LocaleLayout.description: Top clinics, check-ups, plastic surgery, and more.
